languages.text: {n}Мужчина вздыхает и осеняет себя движением руки, в котором смутно угадывается отгоняющий зло жест Механикус.{/n}
{n}The man sighs and makes a sign with his hand that is vaguely reminiscent of a Tech-Priest gesture to ward off evil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина вздыхает и осеняет себя движением руки, в котором смутно угадывается отгоняющий зло жест Механикус.{/n}

languages.text: {n}男はため息をつくと、なんとなく技術司祭がする魔除けのジェスチャーを思い起こさせるような印を手で組む。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man sighs and makes a sign with his hand that is vaguely reminiscent of a Tech-Priest gesture to ward off evil.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}男はため息をつくと、なんとなく技術司祭がする魔除けのジェスチャーを思い起こさせるような印を手で組む。{/n}
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}男人叹了口气，做了个手势，看起来隐约像是技术神甫用于抵御邪恶的手势。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man sighs and makes a sign with his hand that is vaguely reminiscent of a Tech-Priest gesture to ward off evil.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}男人叹了口气，做了个手势，看起来隐约像是机械修会成员用于抵御邪恶的手势。{/n}
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}Tout en laissant échapper un long et profond soupir, l'homme fait un signe de la main rappelant un geste de technoprêtre destiné à repousser le mal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man sighs and makes a sign with his hand that is vaguely reminiscent of a Tech-Priest gesture to ward off evil.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tout en laissant échapper un long et profond soupir, l'homme fait un signe de la main rappelant un geste de l'Adeptus Mechanicus destiné à repousser le mal.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}El hombre suspira y realiza un gesto con su mano que recuerda vagamente al que haría un tecnosacerdote para alejar el mal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man sighs and makes a sign with his hand that is vaguely reminiscent of a Tech-Priest gesture to ward off evil.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre suspira y realiza un gesto con su mano que recuerda vagamente al que hacen los Mechanicus para alejar el mal.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}Der Mann seufzt und macht mit der Hand ein Zeichen, das vage an eine Techpriester-Geste zur Abwehr böser Mächte erinnert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man sighs and makes a sign with his hand that is vaguely reminiscent of a Tech-Priest gesture to ward off evil.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann seufzt und macht mit der Hand ein Zeichen, das vage an eine Mechanicus-Geste zur Abwehr böser Mächte erinnert.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}İç çeken adam, Tekno Rahiplerin kötülüğü kovmak için yaptığı el hareketini andıran bir işaret yapıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man sighs and makes a sign with his hand that is vaguely reminiscent of a Tech-Priest gesture to ward off evil.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Adam iç çekiyor ve Tekno Rahiplerin kötülüğü kovmak için yaptığı el hareketini uzaktan andıran bir işaret yapıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chief
